name: Kashima Reiko
description:
Kashima Reiko is a tale about a young woman who is beaten & left for dead. There are many variations to this tale that you can find. Can you uncover the story of what really happened to Kashima Reiko & set her soul free?



Kashima Reiko has 7 endings to find in total. Make sure you look everywhere & read all the info available to you in order to collect all the evidence.  Or just get the hell out of there and head home. 


Kashima Reiko also contains links to various sites where you can explore the origin of the story & why it became so popular in Japan. 


If you like the games I provide why not consider supporting me on Patreon where you get access to early access games, demo's & exclusive games only available on Patreon.  You can also follow me on Twitter to show your support which also means the world to me. 

Patreon - https://www.patreon.com/trialbyfir3
